q: Can I switch my plan - between Pay Per Credit and Professional (unlimited) scanning?
a: Yes, you can switch between Pay Per Credit and the Professional plan at any time. Just update your plan from the dashboard—your data and scan history remain intact. Changes are applied seamlessly to match your billing cycle.

q: How do I purchase additional scan credits?
a: You can easily purchase additional scan credits directly from your ZeroThreat dashboard (Settings > Scan Credits). Just navigate to the scan credits section, click on Buy Scan Credit, select the quantity you need, and complete the checkout. Your new credits will be available instantly.

q: What discount do I get if I choose an annual subscription plan?
a: By choosing an annual subscription plan, you get 20% cost savings compared to paying monthly. It’s a smarter, more economical option for those who want long-term access while keeping expenses lower.

q: Is there a difference in features between Pay Per Scan and Professional plans?
a: The Professional plan includes advanced features like CI/CD tools integration (GitLab, CircleCI, Bitbucket, and more) and Project Management integration (Jira, Slack, Trello, etc), which are not available in the Pay Per Scan plan. However, all core scanning capabilities are consistently available across all plans.

q: Can I scan multiple targets with the Pay Per Credit plan?
a: Yes, with the Pay Per Credit plan, you can scan multiple targets. Each scan consumes credits, regardless of the target or host. This gives you the flexibility to scan any number of applications or environments as needed.

q: How is billing handled for Host-Based pricing?
a: Host-based pricing is billed monthly or annually based on the plan you choose for your domains (hosts). Each host allows unlimited scans. You will be notified if adding a new host affects your current billing.

q: How can I change the domain with a target-based scan plan?
a: With the Target-based (Professional) plan, you get a 30-day cooling period that allows you to flexibly change your target or host as needed.

q: Do you offer refunds if I cancel my plan?
a: No, we don’t offer refunds if you cancel a plan.

q: Can I downgrade my Target-Based (Professional) plan?
a: No, the Target-based (Professional) plan cannot be canceled or downgraded during the active subscription period. Please ensure you select the plan that best fits your long-term needs before subscribing.

q: How to get free Credits on ZeroThreat Platform?
a: When you sign up for ZeroThreat, you receive five free credits worth $125 as part of the trial period. This credit can be utilized within 1 year of sign up. You also get a new free credit every month, helping you find and fix the latest vulnerabilities.

q: Can I have multiple plans (Pay Per Credit + Professional) under one account?
a: Yes, you can have both Pay Per Credit and Professional plans under a single account. This is especially useful if you have a host or target that requires less frequent scanning—you can simply purchase a credit for that target while maintaining your Professional plan for others.

q: Can I pause my subscription and resume later?
a: ZeroThreat does not currently support pausing subscriptions. However, you can cancel your plan at any time and resubscribe when you're ready—your account data and scan history will remain available unless manually deleted.

q: What happens if my payment fails or is declined?
a: You don’t need to worry about if your payment fails or is declined. We'll review it promptly and initiate a refund if applicable.

q: Can I view and download my invoices and payment history?
a: Yes, you can easily access, view, and download all your Invoices and Transaction history directly from your account dashboard.

q: Do you offer custom plans for larger organizations?
a: Yes, we offer tailored plans designed to meet the specific needs of larger teams and enterprises. Get in touch with us to discuss your requirements and we’ll build a solution that fits.

We offer both monthly and yearly billing options for all paid plans. Choose the cycle that best fits your budget and flexibility needs. Will I receive a notification before my subscription renews?

q: How do taxes (like VAT or GST) apply to my billing?
a: All applicable taxes, such as VAT or GST, are already included in the plan cost shown. You will not be charged any additional taxes beyond the price listed, ensuring transparent and straightforward billing.

q: Is there a limit on how many users can use the same subscription?
a: There are no restrictions on adding users to your subscription. You can invite as many team members as needed, regardless of the plan you choose.

q: How does ZeroThreat handle currency conversion for international billing?
a: For international billing, we process payments in USD. Currency conversion fees, if applicable, will be determined by your payment provider.

q: What is the minimum number of credits I need to purchase in the Pay Per Scan model?
a: In the Pay Per Scan model, the minimum number of credits you need to purchase is 5.

q: Does the Pay Per Scan plan include rescans? How does rescan work for this plan?
a: Yes, the Pay Per Scan plan includes unlimited rescans for two weeks. During this period, the ZeroThreat allows unlimited verification and validation of previously discovered vulnerabilities. However, it does not crawl for new URLs or findings—it strictly re-tests the vulnerabilities identified in the initial scan.

q: What is the validity period of Pay Per Scan credits?
a: The validity period of Pay Per Scan credits is 1 year from the date of purchase. Any unused credits will automatically expire after 12 months and cannot be renewed or carried forward.
